book.title: The Great Gatsby
book.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
book.description: The Great Gatsby is a novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald, published in 1925. It tells the story of Jay Gatsby, a wealthy man who throws extravagant parties in an attempt to win back his lost love, Daisy Buchanan.

review.review_text: The Great Gatsby is a masterful tale of love and loss. Fitzgerald's writing is impeccable and the characters are richly drawn. A must-read for fans of classic literature.
I found The Great Gatsby to be a bit slow-moving and the ending was a bit disappointing. But, Fitzgerald's writing is beautiful and the characters are well-developed.
